cyclone.name: HARVEY
cyclone.current_location: about 510 mi SSE of Port O’Connor, TX
cyclone.trajectory: drifting northwest to north-northwest, expected to accelerate toward the central Texas coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: between Port Mansfield and San Luis Pass (near Matagorda Bay / Port O’Connor area), TX

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch from north of Port Mansfield to San Luis Pass; Storm Surge Watch from Port Mansfield to High Island
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Texas coast Port Mansfield to High Island and adjacent southwest Louisiana coastline
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds (≥39 mph) possible Friday with a 44 % 5-day chance; hurricane-force winds cannot be ruled out (2 % at 96 h).
weather_observation.storm_surge: Storm Surge Watch indicates 4–6 ft inundation possible from Port Mansfield to High Island, including Freeport.
weather_observation.rainfall: 10–15 inches with isolated 20 inches possible along the Texas coast, producing life-threatening flooding.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents; prolonged flooding due to slow storm motion; potential power outages and port access road closures.
